title: cant login the client says username or password incorrect
body: After the new patch i try to login and it says incorrect username or password. Tried doing client repair still wouldn't work. pls fix

replies.body:
First check that the region has not changed back to NA. I know my client has done that a couple times after patches.

If not try make sure your account has not been compromised in any way. Check your email account for any password reset emails, and also try reset your password just in case.
